TopicTitle: [WIP][1.9.x-1.12.x] Scatterer-atmospheric scattering (0.0838 - 14/08/2022) Scattering improvements, in-game atmo generation and multi-sun support

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 5 minutes ago, tomf said:
> 
> 
> Does the -forec-d3d11 thing work for other people in 64 bit KSP 1.1.1? I am finding it crashes immediatly if I try it.
> 

Have you updated to yesterday's version? Do you have the "use alternate dx11 shaders" option ticked?
I have updated and it crashes well before I get to the scatterer settings. It crashes before I get the KSP loading screen.

> 
> 
> 47 minutes ago, tomf said:
> 
> 
> I have updated and it crashes well before I get to the scatterer settings. It crashes before I get the KSP loading screen.
> 

Have you tested without any other mods? In scatterer no shaders are loaded in the main menu or in the loading screen, everything is loaded once you get in-game. Therefore if you get a crash at any of those screens because of the dx11 command it's most likely not scatterer.

Edited: as [@Blacks](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/145137-blacks/) said the new version is for 1.1.2 not 1.1.1

**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-08T11:07:58Z" title="05/08/2016 11:07  AM" data-short="8 yr">May 8, 2016</time> by blackrack**

[@tomf](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/57809-tomf/)  

first of all way you want to use 1.1.1 when last version of KSP is 1.1.2 & most mod are done for 1.1.2 ?  

Second do you use SVE or anyother visual pack ?  

For me dx11 it was work fine, with noo crash, if i use Scattering 245 + last Eve release ([https://github.com/rbray89/EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements)](https://github.com/rbray89/EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements)

[@blackrack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/104258-blackrack/) enter in game goo to tracking station > open debug window (alt +f12) then hit alt +10 to open Scatterer config window it supose to triger instant EXC spam, config window it will not be functional & if you will close it will stop EXC spam

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

Update: i just test SVE + Scatterer 245 using -forec-d3d11 & yes is instant crash, how i say only last new release of Eve is working aka from version what bring new system with new cubemap texture BUT for who want to use last Eve update is not compatible with SVE because it need to rebuild to new system, same thing for any other visual pack

**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-08T11:19:16Z" title="05/08/2016 11:19  AM" data-short="8 yr">May 8, 2016</time> by Blacks**

[@Proot](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/98932-proot/)

I did some quick testing like this:

![IvXYa12.png](http://i.imgur.com/IvXYa12.png)

    ghost1SettingsList1
    {Item = 1,1,1,1Item = 1,1,1,0.75Item = 1,1,1,0.5Item = 1,1,1,0.25
    }
    
    ghost1SettingsList2
    {Item = 1,1,1,0Item = 1,1,1,-0.25Item = 1,1,1,-0.5Item = 1,1,1,0.75
    }
    
    ghost2SettingsList1
    {Item = 1,1,1,1Item = 1,1,1,0.75Item = 1,1,1,0.5Item = 1,1,1,0.25
    }
    
    ghost2SettingsList2
    {Item = 1,1,1,0Item = 1,1,1,-0.25Item = 1,1,1,-0.5Item = 1,1,1,0.75
    }
    
    ghost3SettingsList1
    {Item = 1,1,1,1Item = 1,1,1,0.75Item = 1,1,1,0.5Item = 1,1,1,0.25
    }
    
    ghost3SettingsList2
    {Item = 1,1,1,0Item = 1,1,1,-0.25Item = 1,1,1,-0.5Item = 1,1,1,0.75
    }

And it seems everything is in order:

<iframe class="imgur-album" frameborder="0" height="550" src="//imgur.com/a/4wXer/embed?background=ffffff&text=1a1a1a&link=4e76c9" width="100%"></iframe>

I made a typo in the config file above which results in two instances being in the same location, so you can see 7 instances per ghost, however with that fixed I can see all 8 instances of every ghost, so it's most likely an issue on your end. Make sure you don't have a typo in the ghost[\*]SettingsList[\*] names.

> 3 hours ago, Thomassino said:
> 
> 
> Thanks for reporting that, gonna look into it. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> BTW, was it working normally before latest scatterer update?
> 

it was working normally before the update which added the choice of two dependencies.

until the problem gets fixed, you can simply tell CKAN to uninstall scatterer, then reinstall it. a clean install doesn't throw the error, only an upgrade to an existing install. EDIT: just noticed [@Steveo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/145109-steveo/) has already posted this workaround.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-08T17:24:06Z" title="05/08/2016 05:24  PM" data-short="8 yr">May 8, 2016</time> by speedwaystar**

I delved into modding today, so I could create some of my very own sunflares for Scatterer! The results so far:![KfFfFlt.png](http://i.imgur.com/KfFfFlt.png)![72X9MqA.png](http://i.imgur.com/72X9MqA.png) It needs a bit of work (such as that the third ghost is sticking out behind another ghost, not where it belongs, and looks bad because of it), but it isn't terrible. As a side note, I can confirm terrain shadows are working, as in the first image.

Was driving a rover around on kerbin, and I saw a mountain in the distance behind a few trees, however, the mountain could been seen threw the trees.  Got a screenshot of the issue, which is being pointed too by the rover.

[http://imgur.com/rpkxFlv](http://imgur.com/rpkxFlv)

Looking for a little help with Scatter.  I have KSP 1.1.2 and Scatter 2v0.0246 installed [via Ckan] -  

I really enjoy the visuals of this mod and as a casual gamer, the mods that add value to my gaming experience, keep me coming back for more game time. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")    

The reason why I stopped using Scatter was:

1.) When decoupling the off artifacts [aka god rays] ,but there was an option for that.  [cool , check]  

2.) Sometimes, when leaving Kerbin, the ocean/atmo would seem to follow me around. [until I did a scene change?]  

3.) The dark side of the planets are well.. yes, dark... but too dark and I was curious if someone can suggest some adjustments in scatter to lean a little toward the stock way?  

Btw - is the above has been discussed, I did go through and read the past couple of pages, but it didn't seem obvious and I don't mean to cause any problems.  thanks.

i know you are streaming & i know way you ask about dark moment but for situation like that there are 2 mods what can help you:

1. Ambient Light Adjustment =

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/64901-110-ambient-light-adjustment-2564-230416-continued/&do=embed"></iframe>

2. Minimum Ambient Lighting

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/61425-11-minimum-ambient-lighting-v121/&do=embed"></iframe>

Pick one & use it when you fell darkness is to overwelm & you will want to let streaming viewer to see something ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

Cheers

I don't want to be rude at all, but Scatterer is in the Add-on Development forum, labeled in first place as WIP ("work in progress").

Imho, you can't expect zero issues. That is unrealistic.

I dont see this listed in the known issues section, so I gotta ask, am I the only one experiencing these two bugs with the ocean:

First one, when I zoom in any IVA view, the ocean zooms with it, making it appear closer or further away than it is. This property remains if I exit IVA view while zoomed.

[http://imgur.com/Hpn0W4n](http://imgur.com/Hpn0W4n)

Second one, when I reach an altitude of about 150km, I get this sphere on the bottom of my screen, which may vary in intensity. It dissappears when I go below the magic line of 150km

[http://imgur.com/NA0Bqe3](http://imgur.com/NA0Bqe3)

edit: I'm using SVE together with Scatterer, but it only happens when Scatterer is installed.
